actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Reported to House from the Committee on Post Office and Civil Service, H. Rept. 96-1281.
Measure called up under motion to suspend rules and pass in House.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for voluntary withholding of State income tax for civil service annuitants.

summary.text: Requires the Office of Personnel Management, upon the request of a State, to enter into an agreement with such State to withhold State income tax from the civil service annuity of any annuitant who requests such withholding. Declares that an annuitant may have only one such request in effect at any time, and not more than two requests in effect in different States during one calendar year. Allows an annuitant to change the State designated to make such withholdings and to revoke any such request.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for voluntary withholding of State income tax for civil service annuitants.
